Package Managers

Class CinemaManager

Object
CinemaManager
public class CinemaManager extends Object
Manager class to manage creation of cinemas

  • Field Details

    • instance

      public static CinemaManager instance
      instance checks whether CInemaManager has been instantiated before. Static variable is the same between objects of the same class.

    • sc

      private Scanner sc

    • FILE

      public static final String FILE
      The file name of the database file that this manager will access

  • Constructor Details

    • CinemaManager

      private CinemaManager()
      Empty class constructor

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static CinemaManager getInstance()
      getInstance checks if CinemaManager has been instantiated before. If no previous instance was created, it creates a new one, else it will use the original instance.

    • read

      public ArrayList<Cineplex> read()
      Function to read database for cineplexes
      Returns:
      ArrayList of cineplexes

    • createCineplex

      public void createCineplex(String name, ArrayList<Cinema> cinemas)
      Methos to create cinieplexes
      Parameters:
      name - Cineplex name
      cinemas - Cinemas to be added to cineplex Data written directly to database

    • createCinema

      public void createCinema(String cineplexName, String id, String classOfCinema, SeatingLayout layout)
      Method to create a cinema
      Parameters:
      cineplexName - Cineplex for cinema to be added to
      id - Cinema ID
      classOfCinema - Cinema class (e.g. Gold Class)
      layout - Cinema seating layout

      newId - New ID

      Id - ID of cinema to edit
      newClassOfCinema - new class
      cineplexName - Cineplex to get cinema from

      Method to edit cinema layout
      Parameters:
      row - number of rows of seats
      column - number of columns of seats
      Id - cinema ID
      cinemplexName - Cineplex to get cinema from
